exceptions.tactic: exists (fun a => match f a with | Some b => match residue_exists b with | exist _ m _ => Some m end | None => match incr_exists unit with | ex_intro _ m _ => Some m end end).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type R_B : Relation B J_B : Join B USA_B : UnitalSeparationAlgebra B f : A -> B a : A The term "f a" has type "B" while it is expected to have type "option ?T0".
Cannot coerce IncreasingSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

original: apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros f. exists (fun a => match f a with | Some b => match residue_exists b with | exist _ m _ => Some m end | None => match incr_exists unit with | ex_intro _ m _ => Some m end end). intros a. unfold IncreasingSeparationAlgebra, UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra, DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra in *. destruct (incr_exists unit) as [m [Hres Hinc]]. destruct (f a) as [b|] eqn:Hf. - specialize (Residue_extensible b m Hres) as [v Hv]. exists v. split. + apply Hv. + apply Hres. - exists m. split. + apply incr_join_self. apply Hinc. + apply Hres.
